column3: “This strain is legit! I felt a burst of energy within the first couple of pulls for a euphoric high as well as aroused. Def have your munchies ready for this one you'll have an increased appetite. Very smooth, relaxing, sedative come down. One of the best strains I have smoked 👌🏾”

“The only strain so far that compelled me to write this review. As someone with Crohn's, a dab of this in the morning really evens up my gut. Has just the right amount of sativa, gives you a nice light buzz”

“Picked up a dub of those strain. Very good smell not over bearing. This should be used at night as it has sedative like traits, I really recommend this for stress relief, loss of appetite & insomnia.”
“great body buzz, very relaxing. A must for the end of the day- good way to tell the mind and body, it's sleep time”
“Good strain relaxing not much couch lock. I personally like couch lock indica.”
“great for pain and for sleeping! awesome strain!”
